Benvenuti alla Bella Vista!

For over 50 years, Bella Vista has been Chicago's premier destination for authentic Italian cuisine. Our family recipes, passed down through generations, bring the flavors of Italy directly to your table.

Our Signature Dishes

Pasta Alla Nonna

Fresh linguine with our grandmother's secret tomato sauce, made from San Marzano tomatoes and fresh basil.

Osso Buco Milanese

Slow-braised veal shanks with saffron risotto, a traditional Northern Italian masterpiece.

Pizza Margherita DOC

Wood-fired pizza with buffalo mozzarella, San Marzano tomatoes, and fresh basil - certified authentic.
